p: The biological activity properties of compounds 63– 65 were evaluated for inhibitory activity against pancreatic lipase. Compounds 63– 65 displayed potent inhibition in the assay with IC 50 values of 2.83 ± 0.52, 5.45 ± 0.69, and 6.63 ± 0.89 μM, respectively, compared to the standard kaempferol (1.50 ± 0.21 μM) [ 29].
